code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import'./Gallery.css';import image1 from'../assets/images/image1.jpg';import image2 from'../assets/images/image2.jpg';import image3 from'../assets/images/image3.jpg';import image4 from'../assets/images/image4.jpg';import image5 from'../assets/images/image5.jpg';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Gallery=()=>{const images=[image1,image2,image3,image4,image5];const[currentIndex,setCurrentIndex]=useState(0);const animationClasses=['from-left','from-right','from-bottom','from-top','zoom-in'];useEffect(()=>{const timer=setTimeout(()=>{document.querySelector('.picture-slot').classList.add('active');},100);return()=>clearTimeout(timer);},[currentIndex]);const nextSlide=()=>{document.querySelector('.picture-slot').classList.remove('active');setTimeout(()=>{setCurrentIndex(prevIndex=>(prevIndex+1)%images.length);},300);};const prevSlide=()=>{document.querySelector('.picture-slot').classList.remove('active');setTimeout(()=>{setCurrentIndex(prevIndex=>(prevIndex-1+images.length)%images.length);},300);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"gallery-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"gallery",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:`picture-slot ${animationClasses[currentIndex%animationClasses.length]}`,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:images[currentIndex],alt:`Picture ${currentIndex+1}`})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"nav-button prev",onClick:prevSlide,children:"<"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"nav-button next",onClick:nextSlide,children:">"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"indicators",children:images.map((_,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:`indicator ${index===currentIndex?'active':''}`,onClick:()=>setCurrentIndex(index)},index))})]});};export default Gallery;
